Title: Two Remain on a Vanishing Planet! This Is the Final Showdown
Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Toshio Furukawa
Plot: Goku and Frieza continue their epic battle as planet Namek crumbles beneath their feet. Back on Earth, Gohan eagerly awaits word of his father's ultimate fate!
